org.jamsim.ascape.r

Class PanelViewLazyDatasetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamsim.ascape.r.PanelViewLazyDatasetProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Saveable

    public class PanelViewLazyDatasetProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements Saveable
    Fetches an REXP by evaluating a given R command, uses it to produce an REXPDatasetProvider and uses that to create a table to display in a PanelView when getPanelView() is first called. Provides that PanelView each time getPanelView() is called.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Bede Maclaurin

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • getPanelView

        public PanelView getPanelView()
        Returns the PanelView if it is not null (that is, it has already been created). Otherwise Uses the R interface to evaluate and R command to get an REXP object which is then used to get an REXPDatasetProvider. Calls createPanelView() to get the PanelView and then returns it.
        Returns:
        PanelView
